remarks: Express the predicate " ` W ` is Archimedean ".  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jan-2018.)
statement:
isarchi.b $e |- B = ( Base ` W ) $.
isarchi.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
isarchi.i $e |- .< = ( <<< ` W ) $.
isarchi $p |- ( W e. V -> ( W e. Archi <-> A. x e. B A. y e. B -. x .< y ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d W x y $.
